snippet: As President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia ordered a troop pullback from the border, President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine said he believed that a full cease-fire could soon be achieved.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin orders troop pullback from Ukraine's border, and Ukrainian Pres Petro Poroshenko says he believes that a full cease-fire could soon be achieved; steps come ahead of meeting between them to discuss six-month conflict in Ukraine.

byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: As President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia ordered a troop pullback from the border, President Petro Poroshenko of Ukraine said he believed that a full cease-fire could soon be achieved.

headline.main: As Putin Talks Near, Both Sides Take Steps to Defuse Ukraine Tension
headline.print_headline: As Putin Talks Near, Steps to Defuse Ukraine

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations
